mapper.select: SELECT m.material_name , ew.create_time , ewd.material_coding , ewd.unit_price_without_tax , ewd.unit_price_including_tax FROM enter_warehouse ew LEFT JOIN enter_warehouse_details ewd ON ewd.original_document_number = ew.document_number AND ewd.del = 0 LEFT JOIN material m ON m.material_coding = ewd.material_coding WHERE ew.del = 0 AND state = 3 AND ewd.material_coding IS NOT NULL AND m.material_name IS NOT NULL and m.material_coding = #{materialCoding} and m.material_name = #{materialName} and rp.createTime > #{startTime} and rp.createTime lt; #{endTime} ORDER BY ew.create_time
